languages.text: Пока Лорд-капитан и офицеры занимаются подавлением бунта, кому-то нужно отыскать Эдельтрада — наследника династии, пользующегося особым снисхождением Леди Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: Пока Лорд-капитан и офицеры занимаются подавлением бунта, кому-то нужно отыскать Эдельтрада — наследника династии, пользующегося особым снисхождением Леди Теодоры.

languages.text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: Пока Лорд-капитан и офицеры занимаются подавлением бунта, кому-то нужно отыскать Эдельтрада — наследника династии, пользующегося особым снисхождением Леди Теодоры.

traits.locale_text: While Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.
While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.
While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

languages.text: Während der Lord Captain und ihre Offiziere damit beschäftigt sind, die Revolte niederzuschlagen, muss jemand Edelthrad suchen – den von Lady Theodora bevorzugten Erben der Dynastie.
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Während der Lord Captain und ihre Offiziere damit beschäftigt sind, die Revolte niederzuschlagen, muss jemand Edelthrad suchen – den von Lady Theodora bevorzugten Erben der Dynastie.

languages.text: Tandis que la seigneure-capitaine et ses officiers s'occupent de mater la révolte, quelqu'un doit retrouver Edelthrad, l'héritier de la dynastie qui a toutes les faveurs de dame Théodora.
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Tandis que la seigneure-capitaine et ses officiers s'occupent de mater la révolte, quelqu'un doit retrouver Edelthrad, l'héritier de la dynastie qui a toutes les faveurs de dame Théodora.

languages.text: 领主舰长与她的军官正在忙着镇压叛乱，必须有人去寻找艾德萨德的下落，他是西奥多拉夫人尤为青睐的王朝继承人。
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长与她的军官正在忙着镇压叛乱，必须有人去寻找艾德萨德的下落，他是西奥多拉夫人尤为青睐的王朝继承人。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンと士官たちが反乱の鎮圧に奔走する間に、誰かがレディ・シオドーラが寵愛する王朝の後継者、エデルスラドを見つける必要がある。
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンと士官たちが反乱の鎮圧に奔走する間に、誰かがレディ・シオドーラが寵愛する王朝の後継者、エデルスラドを見つける必要がある。

languages.text: Mientras la Lord Capitán y sus oficiales aplastan la rebelión, alguien tiene que encontrar a Edelthrad, el heredero de la dinastía a quien más favorece lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Mientras la Lord Capitán y sus oficiales aplastan la rebelión, alguien tiene que encontrar a Edelthrad, el heredero de la dinastía a quien más favorece lady Theodora.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan ve subayları, isyanı bastırmakla meşgulken birisinin Leydi Theodora'nın gözdesi olan, hanedanlık vârisi Edelthrad'ı bulması gerek.
languages.original_text: While the Lord Captain and her officers are busy crushing the revolt, someone needs to find Edelthrad — the dynasty heir particularly favoured by Lady Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan ve subayları, isyanı bastırmakla meşgulken birisinin Leydi Theodora'nın gözdesi olan, hanedanlık vârisi Edelthrad'ı bulması gerek.
